reviewText:
First of all, the DVD must have been available from when I was in grade school as the voice-over and cinematography seem very familiar (1970s). However, it does have good information on earth's tilt, especially in a "Light on the earth" activity that I perform in my classroom.

While I still wish there was a more up-to-date feature on the earth's tilt and the seasons, this will suffice until PBS, National Geographic or one of those other "sciencey" programs covers it.
